alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 11:31AM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Red Chute Bayou At Sligo affecting Bossier and Bienville Parishes. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Red Chute Bayou At Sligo. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, Overflow will begin to affect the small mobile home park in the Sligo community just south of the Sligo-Caplis highway. Also expect flooding of farmland in southern Bossier Parish between Red Chute Bayou and the Flat River. Livestock should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 32.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will crest at 34 feet early Sunday morning - Flood stage is 31.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued this evening.
